results.title: Ethereal Extract of Pepper: Preventing Atherosclerosis and Left Ventricle Remodeling in LDL Receptor Knockout Mice
results.text_hl: After 60 days, treatment with both red pepper ethereal extracts and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ prevented @DISEASE_Dyslipidemias @DISEASE_MESH:D050171 @@@dyslipidemia@@@, @DISEASE_Atherosclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@atherosclerotic lesion@@@ progression, and @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@left ventricle hypertrophy@@@.

citations.NLM: Dos Santos L, Maciel LO, Gracia EKI, Soares EA, Sarto DAQS, Barauna VG, Estrela HFG, Rocha CM, Carvalho MDGS, Boas BMV, Garcia JAD. Ethereal Extract of Pepper: Preventing Atherosclerosis and Left Ventricle Remodeling in LDL Receptor Knockout Mice Prev Nutr Food Sci. 2021 Mar 31;26(1):51-57. PMID: 33859959

results.title: Effects of simvastatin on left ventricular hypertrophy and function in rats with aortic stenosis.
results.text_hl: Effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@left ventricular hypertrophy@@@ and function in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ with @DISEASE_Aortic_Valve_Stenosis @DISEASE_MESH:D001024 @@@aortic stenosis@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin prevents load-induced protein tyrosine nitration in overloaded hearts.
results.text_hl: The aim of the present report was to evaluate the regulation of @CHEMICAL_3_nitrotyrosine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C002744 @@@nitrotyrosine@@@ production during the development of load-induced @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@LVH@@@ and the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment in this process.

citations.NLM: Nadruz W Jr, Lagosta VJ, Moreno H Jr, Coelho OR, Franchini KG. Simvastatin prevents load-induced protein tyrosine nitration in overloaded hearts. Hypertension. 2004 May;43(5):1060-6. PMID: 15023931

results.title: The effects of simvastatin on left ventricular hypertrophy and left ventricular function in patients with essential hypertension.
results.text_hl: This experiment indicated that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ can reverse @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@left ventricular hypertrophy@@@ and improve left systolic function.

citations.NLM: Pan XD, Zeng ZH, Liang LY, Luo JD, Xiao AY, Lai Q, Wen YH, Lu DF, Wang W, He ZC, He WK. The effects of simvastatin on left ventricular hypertrophy and left ventricular function in patients with essential hypertension. Clin Exp Hypertens. 2011;33(8):558-64. PMID: 21957976

results.title: [Effects of simvastatin on the left ventricular hypertrophy in spontaneously hypertensive rats and its relationship with the expression of protein kinase B].
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: To investigate the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@left ventricular hypertrophy@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@LVH@@@) in spontaneously @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ (SHRs) and its possible mechanism.

results.title: Simvastatin activates the PPARgamma-dependent pathway to prevent left ventricular hypertrophy associated with inhibition of RhoA signaling.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ activates the @GENE_PPARG @GENE_100008892 @@@PPARgamma@@@-dependent pathway to prevent @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@left ventricular hypertrophy@@@ associated with inhibition of @GENE_RHOA @GENE_100340661 @@@RhoA@@@ signaling.

citations.NLM: Zou C, Qi H, Liu ZH, Han L, Zhao C, Yang X. Simvastatin activates the PPARgamma-dependent pathway to prevent left ventricular hypertrophy associated with inhibition of RhoA signaling. Tex Heart Inst J. 2013;40(2):140-7. PMID: 23678211

results.title: Effects of simvastatin on activities of endogenous antioxidant enzymes and angiotensin-converting enzyme in rat myocardium with pressure-overload cardiac hypertrophy.
results.text_hl: Activities of @GENE_CAT @GENE_24248 @@@catalase@@@ and glutathione peroxidase of LV tissue in @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@LVH@@@ group were decreased by 29 % and 23 % (P < 0.01) compared with sham-operated group, and were increased by 32 % and 22 % (P < 0.01) in high dosage @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Sim@@@ treatment group compared with @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@LVH@@@ group.

citations.NLM: Luo JD, Zhang WW, Zhang GP, Zhong BH, Ou HJ. Effects of simvastatin on activities of endogenous antioxidant enzymes and angiotensin-converting enzyme in rat myocardium with pressure-overload cardiac hypertrophy. Acta Pharmacol Sin. 2002 Feb;23(2):124-8. PMID: 11866871

results.title: Simvastatin inhibits cardiac hypertrophy and angiotensin-converting enzyme activity in rats with aortic stenosis.
results.text_hl: For the first time, the results of the present study demonstrate that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ significantly reduces @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@LVH@@@, cardiac tissue @GENE_ACE @GENE_24310 @@@ACE@@@ activity and improves LV performance in pressure-overloaded @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Luo JD, Zhang WW, Zhang GP, Guan JX, Chen X. Simvastatin inhibits cardiac hypertrophy and angiotensin-converting enzyme activity in rats with aortic stenosis. Clin Exp Pharmacol Physiol. 1999 Nov;26(11):903-8. PMID: 10561812

results.title: Inhibition of inducible nitric oxide synthase (iNOS) by simvastatin attenuates cardiac hypertrophy in rats.
results.text_hl: This study was designed to investigate the possible cardioprotective effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@) treatment against @CHEMICAL_Isoproterenol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007545 @@@isoproterenol@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Isoproterenol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007545 @@@ISO@@@)-induced @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@LVH@@@ and the probable underlying mechanism in adult male Wistar @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Ahmed AM. Inhibition of inducible nitric oxide synthase (iNOS) by simvastatin attenuates cardiac hypertrophy in rats. Folia Morphol (Warsz). 2017;76(1):15-27. PMID: 27665951

results.title: [Effect of simvastatin on cardiac fibrosis in patients with essential hypertension].
results.journal: Zhong Nan Da Xue Xue Bao Yi Xue Ban
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: Angiotension converting enzyme inhibitor combined with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ is helpful to reduce the @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@myocardial fibrosis@@@ and to improve the @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@left ventricular hypertrophy@@@ and diastolic function in @DISEASE_Essential_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D000075222 @@@EH@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.
